name: Tim Sauer
text:
AMAZING AMAZING SERVICE!
We had a team event. From start to finish the staff made us feel comfortable and welcomed our business. The quality was great. I highly recommended Marco's!
Thank you to Jordan and Alex.

name: John Doe
text: This place has excellent service when getting delivered. Never ate at the location. Their regular pizza is just okay for me... not a big fan of the dough. They have me absolutely in love with their thin crust pizza though. The sauce is perfect with it.

name: Stef Westphal-Callahan
text: Amazing affordable pizza.... the fantastic & fast service is an added bonus!! We donâ€™t order pizza anywhere else any more! ðŸ˜€

name: L Mercer
text: I took a chance on Marcos knowing nothing about them. I ordered online.  It was a wonderful experience.  Sooo many options!  They even offer delay delivery (choose the time you want it). They followed directions perfectly and the delivery guy even knocked loudly like I asked.  And the food?  DELICIOUS!

name: Jen Wells
text: Super convenient for family movie night! They have a window in the neighboring Family Video store so you can place your order, and search for movies while your order is prepared.

name: Travis Weber
text: Great pizza at a good price and outstanding service.

name: J Kelly
text: Time to go to Domino's on 23rd cause Domino's is way better!

name: Dori R
text: Love the cheap $3 pizza. Great for when your in a hurry.

name: Kevin Mannschreck
text: the best pizza place in town. Just like homemade pizza .

name: Kylie Hoatson
text: Jordon delivered during a blizzard when Midland's Campus was closed (and cafeteria)!  My son said is was amazing pizza!

name: Jon Snow
text: food is great here. the gm was rude to her employees when i came to pick up my pizza one time. i just dont feel like she is very professional. the employees were hard workers though.

name: Leah Jennerman
text: I work at Marco's, but Google keeps asking for my review. All I can say is, after 4 years here I still like the food.

name: Tim Harris
text: Best place for pizza. Always fast delivery.

name: Eric Hughes
text: Good service. Good food.

name: Tanner Ertan
text: Good pizza thin crust favorite

name: Emily Tonjum
text: Amazing! Food is always fresh not frozen. The crust toppers are what make me come back for more.

name: Allen Belmer
text: Good food

name: Richard Visocky
text: Orders are ready and how you wish them to be.

name: A Pad
text: Great service

name: Jamie Goertz
text: The best ever
